Opening Performance

item.performer: Adina · Aviva · Oliver · Bunny Kids Ensemble
item.title: 中秋节
Mid‑Autumn Story + Bunny Dance
长袖舞
Long‑Sleeve Dance
item.bio: 毕业于中国戏曲学院；国家一级京剧演员（湖北省京剧团），工武旦、刀马旦。
Graduate of the National Academy of Chinese Theatre Arts; National Class‑One Peking Opera actress (Hubei Peking Opera Troupe), specializing in wudan and daomadan roles.

item.performer: 秦梓琪（Ziqi Qin）· Byron Liu · Adriano Carvalho（何适）· 周婧瑄（Jingxuan Zhou）

Butterfly Lovers / Jasmine Flower

“Prelude to the Water Melody”
明月几时有
“When Will the Moon Be Clear and Bright?”
item.bio: 迈阿密戴德学院声乐教授。
Vocal professor at Miami Dade College.

“Xiao”

“To the Bright Moon”
梨花颂 (+ 传承二重唱)
Ode to the Pear Blossom (+ Heritage Duet)

item.performer: 宋怡 (Yi Song)· 束放 (Fang Su)
item.title: 浏阳河
“Liuyang River”
item.bio: 国家一级专业古筝演奏家，毕业于中央音乐学院，曾获多项重要器乐比赛大奖。
National First‑Class professional guzheng performer in China, graduate of the Central Conservatory of Music, and winner of major instrument competitions.

item.title: 夜深沉
“Deep in the Night”
item.bio: 著名笛子、二胡、京胡演奏家；曾任解放军空军歌舞团民乐队队长。
Renowned performer of dizi, erhu and jinghu; former head of the folk orchestra of the PLA Air Force Song and Dance Ensemble.

item.performer: 伊淳 (Yi Chun)· Olivia Tsai · Allina · Annie
item.title: 雨巷佳人
“Lady of the Rainy Alley”

item.performer: Angelina Cui（崔墨熙）· Cecilia Stoute Chen（陈天）
item.title: 明月几时有
“When Will the Moon Be Clear and Bright?”
〈我和我的祖国〉与世界名曲
“My Motherland and I” + World Classics
item.bio: 12岁时荣获ELITE国际音乐比赛大奖；获得郎朗的认可与赞誉。
Won the ELITE INTERNATIONAL MUSIC COMPETITION at age 12; received recognition from Lang Lang.

note.title: 中秋节
Mid‑Autumn Festival
note.desc: 农历八月十五，赏月团圆、吃月饼、提灯笼。传说有嫦娥、玉兔、吴刚。圆月象征团圆与思念。
On the 15th day of the 8th lunar month, families reunite to admire the full moon, share mooncakes and lanterns—symbols of togetherness and longing.

note.title: 水调歌头
Prelude to the Water Melody
note.desc: 苏轼 1076 年名篇，借月寄怀，表达“人有悲欢离合，月有阴晴圆缺”的人生感悟，结句“但愿人长久，千里共婵娟”。
Su Shi’s 1076 classic reflects on reunion and separation through the moon; closing wish: “May we all be blessed with longevity, though thousands of miles apart.”

note.title: 舞狮
Lion Dance
note.desc: 寓意驱邪纳福、开运迎吉。分南北狮，锣鼓点配合腾挪跳跃；常见于新春、开业、庆典。
A symbol of luck and protection; Southern/Northern styles with acrobatics to drum–gong rhythms.

note.title: 京剧
Peking Opera
note.desc: “唱念做打”兼具，生旦净丑四行当；脸谱色彩寓意性格，如红忠勇、黑刚直、白多疑。
Blends singing, speech, movement, combat; role types (sheng, dan, jing, chou) with symbolic face‑paint colors.

note.title: 古筝
Guzheng
note.desc: 21弦拨弹乐器，常用五声音阶，滑音与摇指展现流水般音色。
A 21‑string plucked zither known for glissandos and shimmering tremolos.

note.title: 套圈
Ring Toss
note.desc: 用小圈套住奖品，套中就赢！
Toss rings to land on prizes and win!

note.title: 投壶
Pitch Pot
note.desc: 投箭进壶，命中拿奖品！
Throw arrows into a pot to win prizes!

note.title: 筷子比赛
Chopstick Challenge
note.desc: 30秒夹糖果，比谁多谁赢。
Players pick candies in 30 seconds; the winner wins prizes!

note.title: 漆扇
Painted Fan
note.desc: DIY彩绘或装饰纸扇，做专属小扇子。
Decorate a paper fan with colors and patterns.

note.title: 中国手工
Chinese Handicrafts
note.desc: 制作灯笼、拉拉龙或漆扇。
Make lanterns, pull dragons, or painted fans.

note.title: 传统服装
Traditional Costume
note.desc: 试穿中国传统服装，拍美照。
Try on traditional Chinese clothes and take photos.
